content.detailedDescription: My mother and i were traveling to albuquerque on us highway 54, northbound, at approximately milepost 86, when we saw one bright orange sphere turn into 2, then 3, then four, in a horizontal line, then blinked off one by one, then blinked back on again, and then off again.  the spheres were to the left of our vehicle and seemed pretty low and large up in the sky. the suv in front on of us must have seen it too because it began swerving all over the road and kept changing turn signals.  then we saw one orange sphere at a much higher altitude flying at a high rate of speed, in southeast direction, followed by an airplane flying at a much slower speed. while sphere approached west horizon of mountains, blinked out of sight.  the plane pursued it until then and flew in circles after it disappeared.  my mother and i were very excited and amazed by the presence of the spheres.  i was pretty sure they were ships and not made by our military.
content.summary: Brilliant glowing oranges spheres

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting around a campfire making s'mores with my boyfriend's family, the night after thanksgiving. it was my first time in bumpass, va, we were staying at a lakehouse and we were sitting right next to the water. the surrounding area is predominantly woods and there are many abandoned houses, planes, and cars lying in random fields. my boyfriend said "look at that shooting star" and we all turned around. we knew it wasn't a shooting star immediately because by the time you turn around to see one it's usually gone, but the object we saw in the sky was visible for 3 seconds (my boyfriend says 4 seconds because he was the first to see it). it was also obvious that whatever it was, it was inside the atmosphere, and at least (i'm not good with distances) a mile away. after the 3 seconds i saw it, it disappeared behind the tree line. it looked like a glowing, blue, slightly oblong ball. it moved in a horizontal, slightly downward motion across the skyline. it wasn't floating, or falling, and didn't even seem to be flying the way a plane does. the best word to describe it was it seemed like it was driving. everyone around the campfire saw it, 8 of us were adults ranging from 19 to 60, 3 were teens and 4 were kids ranging from 6 to 9. the campfire was not obstructing my view of the object. when i saw the object the first thing i thought was "that's not a falling star" and the second thing i thought was "that's a ufo". i remember being completely surprised i saw one on vacation, i remember wishing my dad was there to see it. however, i never thought "oh maybe it was fireworks" "maybe it was a spotlight" like some of the other people around the campfire. i said to them "that was a ufo." they laughed but they stopped guessing what it was. i just felt like i knew it was a ufo. everyone around the campfire then agreed: 1) they had never seen anything like it and 2) they didn't think they would any time soon.
content.summary: Glowing, blue-ish, slightly oblong ball moved horizontal across the skyline for 3-4 seconds.

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend informed me that every christmas i tell him a story about a ufo. he said he thought christmas lights reminded me of it. this year he insisted that i research to find any information about what i had seen in the ocala national forest. i had told him of an encounter i had and that it was reported in the ocala star banner the next day. however, i had never pursued any information about it.

on may 14, 1978 at night, i was coming home from ocala with a girl friend.I was driving down an unpaved isolated road where i lived when i had an encounter with a craft. all i can recall of the event is that my friend and i were standing, leaning back against my car looking up at a craft. it was a hazy experience. i remember looking at her profile and  thinking that the light was so bright that i could see tiny little hairs on her nose.I recall feeling like i was moving in slow motion. i can best describe the craft as reminding me of giant tinker toys. it had round pod like compartments connected with large cylinders.  it had green, white and i think red lights (looked pinkish) anyway the colors seemed to look like muted and blurred neon lights. i think that it was no more than 20 - 30 feet away from us. i do not remember getting out of my car or getting back into my car and going home. the next morning i said to my friend, off-handedly "do you remember seenng that last night"? her reply was yes. and that was the end of the discussion. the event seemed dream like and i had no impulse to talk about it further with her, nor did she with me. i vaguely remember something about my friend's face looking like it was sun burnt, but don't recall if my face was burnt. 

i remember seeing this object hovering silent and still above us and i remember being outside my car and everything else is a blank. my research of this event corresponds with the sightings at the pine castle electronic center. so for any other reports of this sighting, i will attest 100 percent that this craft was there.
content.summary: Stood looking up  at a craft on a isolated road in ocala national forest

content.detailedDescription:
It was about when i was 14 years old aprox. i was traveling to lima to caraz-anchas department. it was around 11 p.M. i dont remember exactly.
i was looking for the window (whenever i travel at night i like to see the sky), when i saw something like a star, at the begining i dont care about it, but then it changed form a white light color to red then range and yellow and that way very fast... it seemed to be flying over the mountains like if it was following something, but what? i maked me that question... for a while i thought i was following the bus, the i noticed it didn,t. 
i saw it for about 18 minutes or a little more... then it elevates to the sky very fast and desapeared...
content.summary: A fireball seemed to be following the bus...

content.detailedDescription:
New years eve, 1999.  i was attending a small party east of the city of sarasota. shortly before midnight i stepped out of my friends' house for a breath of fresh air.  it was a clear moonless night though there were not many stars visible due to the city lights. i had a wide vista, horizon to horizon, and noticed a bright red light low on the eastern horizon.  thinking it might be an aircraft i kept my eyes on it to see which direction it was traveling. well, it didn't seem to be moving at all and i thought maybe it was coming directly at me, but i saw no other lights as you would with standard aircraft so i continued to watch it. after approximately another 30 second from the time i first spotted it, the light traveled from just above the horizon to a position not quite directly over me and it was then that i could tell that it was at a very significant altitude. the object took less than a second to travel what i determined to be a fair distance. no gradual acceleration...Just bang... from just above the horizon to almost directly over me and stopped in less than a second. it stayed in that relative position for between 20 to 30 seconds, and it was while i was watching it in that position that i detected a sort of pulsating effect.  i don't know if that was caused by  atmospheric conditions or not as it was a clear, cool night. again, almost instantly, it covered another large portion of the sky heading west and stopped. i was able to follow it because it sort of left a very brief trail, streaking from position to position. it remained motionless for approximately 20 seconds more and then shot off west and disappeared over the horizon. i can say that my heart rate increased but it did not freak me out, though it did have a profound effect on me and i watch the sky whenever i am outside. please know that i was not drinking that night as i was the designated driver, so intoxication was not an issue in this sighting.
five and a half years later i learned that my uncle & aunt witnessed a ufo while on a caribbean cruise. also on new years eve, 1999. their experience lasted considerably longer than mine did.
content.summary: Brilliant red light just above horizon/east.  traversed sky east to west in three quick moves in less that a minute and a half.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving south on route 11 about 9:15pm tuesday jan 5th 2010
the appalachian mountains are to my left.  i have lived in this area my who life and have never seen anything like this here before.  what i seen was two very large craft side by side.  they were flying west or north west and were just right abve the top of the mountain.  i had only seen this craft for under a minute.  looking at it to the left was craft one.  it had four very large lights on it from left to right.  there was a craft to the right of it with two large lights on it and a strobe in the middle.  i think it may be fixed wing military cargo plane because just as i was trying to pull over to get a better look the craft tilted to the left and the craft next to it tilted as well and they went north along the mountain.  these were very nright lights and the craft appeared to be fairly large.  from my vantage point the mountain is roughly 10 miles to the peak from where i was observing.  the four light craft looked like a very large house(size of) from wing tip to wing tip(if it was a plane).  if there is anybody who can look up military flight paths in this area that would be great.  i know they were not commercial airliners as they do not get that close to the trees as these were.
content.summary: Massive ufo or military craft?

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were in san diego gaslamp quarter for new year's eve. we returned to our hotel on island ave and 4th st. around 1am and my husband was on the balcony smoking. he called me out to look at something unusual in the sky. i saw at least 4 orange orbs in the sky. they were a unique color which i thought was interesting.  at first didn't look like anything unusual until i noticed them moving. it was smooth but erratic and unlike any conventional flying machinery. they would speed up and slow, turn corners quickly but always smooth and no sound that we could hear. one appeared to have an even smaller orb orbiting it quickly as it moved. my husband said he saw more than one with an orbiting orb but i only clearly saw the one. there was also an airplane trail of clouds and the orbs were under those clouds, so closer to the ground than an airplane. i watched for about 2 minutes or so but my husband followed them for about 10-15 minutes. then they moved either higher in to clouds or moved behind the building so that we could no longer see them.

this is my first sighting of anything i could not explain.  my husband looked up on youtube that day and saw a number of other people with video and comments of the same thing we saw in san diego and other areas of the world.  i definitely saw something i could not explain in the sky that night.
content.summary: Orange orbs in sky over san diego

content.detailedDescription: At 6 am i got up to use the restroom and i have a window that faces out towards the north.I always look around and i have seen over the last few weeks at different times lights towards the north over the airspace where planes come in to reno airport.This time the light was star-like and way lower then the stars in the sky.As i watched this and really focused on it,i could begin to make out the fact that it was spinning.It seemed to be located over the area towards sparks blvd and los altos area.I got the feeling that it was watching something as it seemed to move slow and in a sweeping pattern.The way it was moving made me think it was a drone or something small but not too small.I looked to see if any planes were on aproach but no planes in the sky.I watched it do a sweep of the area and after about 10 min. it just seemed to flash out.There is a pasture in that area that this object was sweeping but don't know if it was watching something over there.I have also seen a light formation comming in from the north too always around the 2:45am to 4 am time.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Star like object in cross path of airport traffic.

content.detailedDescription:
"two triangles appeared (3 spheres each) first, an arrow of truth, ominious...A spirit ...Passed overhead soundlessly followed by the second triangle straight up maybe 100 feet up over lake seminole (sacred indian grounds) hurricane ida was gusting winds passing by our coast that night. i searched for my handycam in my van then sat in the drivers seat knowing they were waiting overhead.This took from 12:00am when the triangles came to approx 12:23 when i stepped out of the van and began filming. a few minutes afterward they left. 
12:57 (not on this video) yet on the original disc a saturn red globe and a red dot passed by. this is my second encounter the first in 1981 where my wife, 5 month daughter and i were encountered in a deserted campground on the east coast of fla at approx 12:00 midnight by a star my wife saw that was moving and then appeared directly over us blocking out the entire sky and we were enveloped in beautiful ultraviolet rays and we just looked up. then next we are in the field again yet it was morning! daybreak with birds chirping. since then i began writing this music composition that i put to this video 29 years later.And 29 years for me could be 29 minutes for them.I have been a vegetarian since 19 years old."

used nitespot plus sony handycam which sends a beam of light.  gate slammed and scared the objects.  came back over him at 4-5 feet and danced. took picture of van. objects went back. 
witness' mother saw the lights from her condo later.
witness went back to atlanta to see a friend. tried to download the video but could not finalize it. 

mary margaret zimmer fl
content.summary: Two triangles appeared soundlessly

content.detailedDescription:
Traveling southeast on lassiter road in johnston county at 6:25pm on dec. 30, 2009. two eyewitnesses saw a small, square craft slowly float by. the craft was very dark, and the evening light made it difficult to determine an exact shape. it seemed to be square, dark, about 25ft. square base and maybe 5ft tall. 

we were first caught off guard that a plane would be flying so low at night with no ground lights, but then noticed how slowly the craft was moving.The craft traveled exactly due west (we returned later that night with a compass) about 50-60ft off the ground and 40 yards to our left over a field at about 30mph. the craft had two dim lights, one was definitely red. i thought the other light was a dim green, but the other eyewitness remembered it as a dim white light. 

i pulled over, rolled down my window and noticed no sound coming from the low flying craft. i turned around and followed the craft for a few minutes, but it was traveling too low to the tree tops that i soon lost sight of it through the trees. also, it was headed due west, and lassiter road runs northwest by southeast. so the craft was traveling further away from me the further i traveled up lassiter road. 

it could have been a plane. but... it was flying very low, extremely slowly, and made no noise. a cessna flying that low at night would have had ground lights on and been remarkably loud and fast. 

i have attached a comp for reference.
content.summary: Dark, square shape, two dim lights (red/green), 50ft. off ground, 30mph due west.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to take down christmas lights and saw all of my neighbors outside looking up, i asked my husband whats going on and he said that they saw a ufo and its still there.  i went in my back yard and looked at it, at first because of the blinking lights you would think it was a plane, but it didnt move it stayed in the same place.  so i went back to the front where ppl had binoculars and i asked to see with them.  i saw and very noticably it was changing colors from red, blue and green and white.  it was there for at least an hour, thats when i stopped watching.  several ppl saw the same thing.
content.summary: Flying object with blinking lights

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i were driving near the intersection of fm306 and us281 when we noticed something in the sky, it caught our attention with a burst of blue light, very brightly and we thought it was a meteorite. it came down in front of my cars windshield and we could see it. then it seemed to level out and move further north to a stop. it then stopped and hovered. it seemed to be shaking or wobbling, it did this about 2 minutes. then either faded out or moved quickly northward into and through blanco county. while it was hovering it was orange and red and pulsing. we couldn't tell how high it was, but it seemed low, maybe around 25,000 feet or the height a commercial airliner might have been at, but it definitely was not a meteorite or comet, at least not one that i have ever seen.

we were in amazement as we watched it, but i was able to call my brother and tell him to look in the sky for it. he was on the south side of his house about 14 miles east of where we were watching the object hover and by the time he headed to the northside the object was gone.

once we got to my brothers house, he called the comal sheriffs department who, he said, were enthusiastic to hear of such a thing but also concerned as to what it was. he said, they called blanco sheriffs department to see if they had any reports.

we can't be the only people to see that tonight.
content.summary: Meteorite look, but then it just stopped and hovered.

content.detailedDescription: This light is in my sky almost every night for the past month or two...    it moves in a shaky kind of way, like something swimming underwater... the light is kind of small and moves where it wants...     it's hard to tell how high up it is because of how small the light seems..  it also dims and gets really bright at times...
content.summary: Pulsating light bouncing around in the sky...

content.detailedDescription:
I was working security , at a local event , i went outside for some air and a smoke, i had seen two bright , what i thought were stars, i paid no mind to it really , and went back inside to continue my work- whilst working - i was posistioned on the deck area, i looked up again and saw only one of what i thought were stars, lots of people had mentioned seeing them, but then dismissed it quickly  as there alchohol intake caught up with them .
i continued to watch the object which was now pulsating , i was gobsmacked,  it then pulsated another couple of times and blinked  then it was gone .
content.summary: I looked up to see two pulsing orbs one i did not see leave , the one i did see was stationary ,then it just blinked out and was gone

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside my home with my dog to play catch like we always do and looked up into the sky looking for shooting stars. when i looked up i seen something large and had twinkling lights. so i thought it was the space station. so i watched for just a few seconds and noticed it would move left to right like it was shaking then sit in one place not moving at all. so i wiped my eyes to ensure that my eyes weren't playing tricks on me. then i seen a small white light the size of a star moving quickly towards it and as it got closer this object moved from the center of the sky 12 o'clock to 3 in a matter of 4 seconds then it came back to where it was at 12 alittle slower but still in just a few seconds slower. i tried calling my kids and my neighbor but got nobody on the phone. i tried to video tape it with my cell phone with no sucess. at this point i could see 3 bright white lights twinkling and a red 1 that never went out. i thought maybe it was a plane or a helicopter but after 20 years in the u.S. army i know nothing we have is that fast, silent or that big. i watch the show ufo files and never thought i would see anything in my life. so after it went back to 12 o'clock i ran into my house to see if i had my rifle scope handy and found my high energy flash light and turned it on pointing it towards this thing and it moved north quickly to about 20 degrees aboue the horizon and stayed there for about 15-20 more minutes. once it went north i ran next door to get my neighbor to witness this so i would know i'm not crazy or seeing things. he came out and could see the object sitting there with flashing lights for about 5 minutes and while i went into the house to finally get my scope and return it had just disappeared.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I thought it was the space station until it started moving side to side then moved across the sky to the far left then back then moved just above horizion and stayed there for about 15 more minutes then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: On our way home from paducah to mayfield, i noticed six orange lights gliding slowly in the sky just off the side of the highway.  the lights appeared to be moving at a slow rate of speed.  my wife, two children and i observed these lights for approximately 5 minutes or more.  several other cars pulled over on the highway in that area as well.  the lights slowly faded out of sight one at a time beginning with the one at the tip of the chevron and ending with the last light.  i was able to take the picture with my cell phone shortly before the lights started disappearing.
content.summary: Six lights floating in sky between mayfield and paducah

content.detailedDescription:
I'm not real sure of date or time. just know it was dark.

me and a friend(both about 14) were walking down the street in covington ky headed for my house. had to be later in afternoon because it was dark out. as we started to turn into my yard. i noticed a cigar shaped object hovering over a hill. it had 2 beams coming from underneath, as it got closer to the ground, the light got wider. i say it was cigar shaped because of the placement of lights. it had various different colored lights around the edge blinking on/off. seems like there should have been tons of reports because it sure looked like it was right above a big housing project. 

i went straight into the house and told my mom. she just looked at me like i was crazy. the next morning she had the newspaper open with the story about the 3 women in casey county ky being abducted. they described it exactally like i explained it to my mom. 

here is the really weird part for me. my family has always called me casey. i used that name until i was 18 and was forced to use my real name,,,lol they still call me casey. actually just pulled envelope out of mail with it being to casey mull. i thought for a long time it was a message. they abducted the women in casey county ky to let me know i was next.

i will always believe that i saw the ufo that abducted those 3 women.
content.summary: Same ufo that abducted women in casey cnty ky?

content.detailedDescription:
Driving along westbound,happen to look over to my left and saw a triangular craft hovering,had really bright lights,like headlights but pointing at the ground,and at the top it had a dome like structure,it had read and green lights like an airplane,but it was not a plane at all.
condition was partly cloudy but i could see it clearly.
i would be interested if someone else see this craft other than me.
content.summary: Driving along i-69 westbound @ hamerburg rd.

content.detailedDescription:
To whom it may concern:

     i took this footage while on a hike in keremeos bc. i was doing a big hike in remote wilderness i was at about 8,000-8,500ft elevation.  it was a 15 hr day of hiking. at the time i wasn't aware that i had filmed anything out of the ordinary.  i noticed it while showing the video to my family.  i've watched it frame by frame and still havn't come to any conclusion as to what it is.  the file names are the times that it appears. it happens real fast so look real close.
content.summary: Strange object in videoclip.

content.detailedDescription:
Please refer to the report that mr.Wertman has filed with mufon.

                                            many thanks ,
      
                                             sharon d. shriver
content.summary: I saw actually 6 ufo's near my home between dec. 23 and the evening of christmas .  my husbsnd was witness to one of them. we contacted thomas wertman, mufon  investigator for cup

content.detailedDescription: From my back porch and then my front porch, i happenened to look south into the setting sky and observed a pulsating contrail emanting from a horizontal cloud and a few minutes later observed a narrow trail of smoke perpindicular from the contrail. no object was observed. the pulsating contrail reminded me of recent reports of similar sightings.
content.summary: Did not see object but observed a pulsating trail emanting from a horizontal cloud

content.detailedDescription: Walking out of my house with my brother he spotted it and because there was no sound for the height of it he shouted ufo. i looked up and saw it and thought the same because of the colour and the size of the object and there was no sound at all. then i got my phone out and filmed for 10 to 15 secs and then ran inside to get more witnesses. they came out  and witnessed it too. i then disappeared in to the distance.
content.summary: Flying around the height of a police helicopter no sound at all thats why it was suspicious

content.detailedDescription:
I had inflimation around my heart and my chest was hurting so bad.I talked my ex girlfriends farther who lived next door to about the pain and we decided to go to the hospital.So he drove me.We talked for a long time even on the way back from the hospital.We were in a deep conversation the only thing that could break our convo would be to get in a car crash.But while we were talking i notice a bright light.I was living up state so you have to understand that when its dark outside its really dark. since we were driving towords the light it got brighter and brighter.I thought it was a plane or street light but it was to big and it wasn't moving. mean while my ex-girlfriends farther is still talking.I started to get really uncomfortable i thought maybe im thinking correctly. because a week before a read a book called communion.But when we got real close to this big hovering shining thing.My ex-girlfriends farther who was driving said '' what the hell is that''.Thats when i tarted to panic,i see it he sees it it must be real.It was one of the few times in my life where i was truely scared for my life.We both remained silent for the remainder of the drive.The brightly lite ufo just hovered like 50 feet over a house and near some tall trees once our car past the ufo it started to slowly hover away from the house as if to imitate a plane but i was not fouled.I was so shook up that i waited till we got back home to say anything to the driver.I ranted and raved about this ufo that we saw to my ex-girlfriend.

another event that happened to me.I just moved back to nyc from ithaca ny.Andi was on a greyhound coming back to the city. this was right before the small snow storm in december 2009.I was listening to music when i looked out of the window and saw a lone star in the sky.First off i told  there was a snow storm the day after.The sky was very cloudy so cloudy that you cant see any stars in the sky. yet i looking at a bright lone star.I told my self in my head while i continued to look a the lone star ''you are not fooling me'' you wont belive what happened next the so called star disappeared right before my eyes.It didnt vanished  it went from a big circle to a smaller one to a smaller one till it was gone but it happened so fast.I belive these beings can read our mind.And i also belive these being have a lot to do with the bible. thank you for listening to my story.
content.summary: I was coming back from the hospital with my ex=girlfriend's father and we both saw a very bright big hover object near a house and some trees.

content.detailedDescription:
July 7,2005  9:30 pm
i was loading a ladder onto van when i saw a spacehip in the sky coming from the west i saw a lighted spaceship with landing gear it flipped up on its side  to avoid hitting some of the trees and the top of it had a  big light which glowed similiar to the moon and  it landed in a wooded area across the road.There was intense bright lights underneath the ship the lights were bright as a bolt of lighting. after about 15 minutes the lights went out. i crossed the road and went into the woods to see what it was. i came around the hill there were 2 police cars they had saw it previously in the sky going over wal-mart parking lot.They left  continued to walk over to the are where i saw it.When i got in a distance the ship had a large fan covering the bottom of the ship  a dim glow of lights showed from underneath.There were 3 steps that came from underneath with a small door on the side of the ship.  i walked around it and looked undderneath it i thought it was from the airforce. i walked inside it was dark inside the fan was blowing air reminded me of a broiler room in a factory. i saw a head that looked like a kangeroo. the inside was filled with electrical cables with vent pipes going up to the top of the ship. there were 3 they turned around they were short with large black eyes. they had skin like a lizzard. they came toward me but made no sound of communication.I had a flashlight in my hand they reached for the light.
i handed them the light they begn shaking the light. i just stood there looking at them i tried to communicate with them but they did not respond but they were looking at me curiously. one touched me on the arm and it scared me so i ran out of the woods and back across the road.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Spaceship landed  in wooded area from my home

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the back seat with my son, on the 395 south, near mono lake, when the driver noticed a bunch of x type clouds in the sky, then we saw many white airplanes leaving contrails, but these weren't normal contrails. they did not disappear, and they grew huge, some the the trails were stringy, some were thin and then epanded, then as we reached the mono lake veiw point we noticed a rainbow.  i took a picture through the window, and was happy with it, so we didn't get out of the car. we then saw some white planes flying over leaving the never disappeaing trails and  we all decided that the planes must be seeding the clouds for rain? but, why would they send 100's of these large planes out... we pulled out back on the 395 and i noticed another rainbow? now there were 2, i took some pictures and said you guys these areen't rainbows. if they were they would have been gone by now. the driver said yeah i thought rainbows disappear pretty fast. then he kinda was looking worried at the sky. i started taking pictures of te rainbows they seemed pretty much to stay in the sky and thats when i noticed something moving in and around the rainbow/trails.
i tought now i'm gonna catch a picture of what it is. as we headed to the top of mammoth mountain i took so many pictures then i kinda thought my self crazy. lol. i had to go to the restroom, and as i was getting out of the car i saw the rainbow/prisim/whatever it was move again... i took a picture and then i looked at the picture and almost fainted. i finally got a picture of what was moving . you can see the series of photos at utube. if you want to look at them.

the spheres hid in the trails of the white planes, and i then felt i really seen a ufo.  i felt kinda weird and said to myself look and see if you see anything like what they looked like in any of the pic's i took. went through nothing. nothing was a green round and white round 3d looking in my camera. i showed the picture to my friends in the front seat. and they really got scared and said lets get outta here. we lost sight of the spheres but continued seeing the chemical trails and white planes till we got to little pine and the sun went down and it became dark.
content.summary: Chemtrails, then reflection type rainbow, then 2 orbs.

content.detailedDescription: Me & my best friend was riding our bikes back from la mirada park  when out of the orange county area a large aluminum saucer caught my eye and i threw down my bike and ran out in the street yelling & waving to it and my friend rodney  also saw it   it stopped for 6 to 10 minutes  then proceeded down rosecrans ave over the 5 freeway straight towards the lax direction    now the shape was dome top/ disc on the side/ with  tea cup bottom the entire saucer was made of aluminum looking material and was easily viewed because it wasn't trying to hide  at less than 600 feet   no lights no abstracted view    it was awesome    so now you know the truth     personally i think its the government  they lie because its nuclear  powered and dangerous also top secret and we wouldn't want any other country to have it like nukes   the one that crashed in roswell was a test flight  they have always lied about all the really good flying craft   and just about every thing else they feel the need to lie about   now you know the truth ps i don't care what any one says because i already know what i saw     it sure wasn't a light in the distance  or any normal flying craft   big brother is watching  and he knows much more than i do     but he will never tell the truth  just me & jesus    color was  silver aluminum  sort of like a flying fortress metal      all you have is my word and you best believe because its the absolute truth   now you know the truth
content.summary: Aluminum saucer hoovered over us

content.detailedDescription:
Rapid movements so fast i could not track it with my head/eyes.  more visable infront of trees as it passed by.  no apparent flight pattern, more like a buzzing fly, there then gone, now there etc....  some circaling. distance 2 ft. to 500feet.  i was walking my two dogs and they noticed it as well, barking and making fleeting efforts at chase.  very strange experience-first ever.  it followed us through the park and to my car, have not seen it since.

i first thought someone had a lazer or pinpoint powerfull flashlight moving it from all directions 

its actions ramped up as i walked almost to get me going in a particular direction.  it would circal at the outermost obstacles then seem to pass through and by me like a buzzing fly.

at first i was looking for who or what could be making this and then realized it was impossible.  became sceptical of my own eyes, but the dogs reminded me i wasn't the only one seeing things.  

the mood was apprehensive and cautious at first but then my dogs were playing and i was trying to talk to it...  so no real fear, other than the unknown. 

we were done with our walk and left...
content.summary: Rapid movements so fast i could not track it with my head/eyes.  more visable infront of trees as it passed by.  no apparent flight pattern, more like a buzzing fly, there then gone, now there etc....

content.detailedDescription:
I was getting a drink from the kitchen and looked out the window when i saw two spots of light. i have lived in my neiborhood for over 5 years and have never seen anything so unusual. i have no idea what it could be. the lights were seen in the east sky. there were two orange/yellow lights side by side that stayed in the same spot for 8 to 10 minutes. i got my camera and started to take pictures. then the lights started to move left behind a line of trees. then it moved down for a second or two then moved up over the trees and back down behind them again.

it was out of sight for at least 5 to 7 minutes. while it was out of sight i called my father, who lives close by, to see if he was able to spot it. he could not see it so i continued to watch for the lights. when it appeared over the tree line again the lights were flashing. it stayed for 20 or 30 seconds then started to move to the right in a straight line. then it changed direction back to the left in a straight line and i lost sight of it. i searched for several minutes and did not see it again.
content.summary: Two orange/yellow lights that stayed in the same spot for 8 to 10 mins

content.detailedDescription: We were stuck in the mud from thrying out a newtoyota 4 runner it got stuck in the mud so we had to walk out to get to a phone when we knoticed it hover in the sky above us we looked up at it and it turned on very bright light that we commented o how bright it my uncle noticed that see could see that i need to shave my face then the light go realy bright. then we herd airplains move up on our possission it slowly turned off the spot light which was very brigth the ufo took off in a westerly direction that was very fast . with in 20 sec. a formation of jet fighters. apperered theses fighters couldnt even keep up or come close to keeping up with when we rechecked our watcheswe had walked aprx.2 miles in less than 15
content.summary: This looked like a fast airplane that stopped in mid air

content.detailedDescription: I stepped out my front door to check on some food i was cooking on the bar-b-q and as i looked up at the sky i saw a bright starlike object approaching from the south/west. it was flying at an altitude that most of the propeller planes fly at but was moving quite rapidly. as it got closer i noticed 6 green lights, two on either side and two on what seemed like a tail but the odd thing was that all of the lights including the bright front light were all pulsing at the same time. as it passed overhead i was waiting for the rumble of a jet engine or the sound of a propeller buzzing in the air but it didnt make a sound i knew right then what i had just witnessed. this is the 2nd ufo i have seen
content.summary: Bright pulsating starlike object
